Room.Name: Evenborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Evenborough Way, west of the Darmanian Center.
Room.LongDescription: The Darmanian Center, on the east side of the road, is a monument dedicated to the first civilizations that existed in what is now Oceancrest. Or so the Darmanian Society wishes to believe. The entrance to the center is located to the east. On the west side of the road is Caldea's Fine Silk shop, where various imported items can be purchased.
